statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE treatment_success = true;
SELECT patient_name, age, treatment_success FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_patients FROM patient_data WHERE nano_technology_application IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE treatment_success = TRUE
SELECT patient_name, age, nano_technology_application FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND nano_technology_application IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, name, age, gender, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patient_data;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT id, name, diagnosis FROM patient_data ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, success, success_date FROM success_rate WHERE success = true ORDER BY success_date ASC;
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE age < 30
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT name, age, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%'
SELECT id, success, success_date FROM success_rate WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY success_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, success_date, success FROM success_rate WHERE success_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM patient_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT treatment, success_rate FROM patient_data ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT staff_name, specialization, experience_years FROM medical_staff;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_date, outcome FROM treatment_history WHERE outcome='Successful';
SELECT * FROM patient_data
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM patient_data WHERE success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY success_rate DESC
SELECT staff_name, specialization FROM medical_staff WHERE experience_years > 5 AND department = 'Cardiology'
SELECT p.patient_name, m.staff_name, t.treatment_date FROM patient_data p JOIN treatment_history t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id JOIN medical_staff m ON m.staff_id = t.staff_id
SELECT * FROM PatientData;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM PatientData WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT treatment, success_rate FROM TreatmentLog WHERE success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT staff_name, specialization FROM MedicalStaff ORDER BY staff_name ASC;
SELECT research_title, outcome FROM ResearchData WHERE research_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM PatientData ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM PatientData WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT patient_name, staff_name, specialization FROM PatientData JOIN MedicalStaff ON PatientData.patient_id = MedicalStaff.staff_id;
SELECT rd.research_title, rd.research_date, tr.feedback FROM ResearchData rd LEFT JOIN TreatmentLog tr ON rd.research_id = tr.log_id;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, treatment FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, date FROM MedicalHistory ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM DoctorInformation WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT treatment_name, success_rate FROM TreatmentDetails WHERE success_rate > 80.00;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, treatment FROM PatientData INNER JOIN MedicalHistory ON PatientData.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM DoctorInformation WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology' AND doctor_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, success_rate FROM PatientData JOIN TreatmentDetails ON PatientData.treatment = TreatmentDetails.treatment_name ORDER BY success_rate DESC

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_name, analysis_date FROM PatientData JOIN MedicalHistory ON PatientData.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id JOIN AnalysisResults ON PatientData.patient_id = AnalysisResults.patient_id ORDER BY analysis_date
